abstract: Creighton O’M. Condon, a mergers-and-acquisitions lawyer, succeeds Rohan S. Weerasingh, who recently joined Citigroup, a longtime Shearman client, as the bank’s general counsel.
snippet: Creighton O’M. Condon, a mergers-and-acquisitions lawyer, succeeds Rohan S. Weerasingh, who recently joined Citigroup, a longtime Shearman client, as the bank’s general counsel.
lead_paragraph: Shearman & Sterling announced on Wednesday that Creighton O’M. Condon, a mergers-and-acquisitions lawyer, has been elected senior partner of the New York law firm.
